com.github.mathiewz.slick

Class ImageBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mathiewz.slick.ImageBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageData

    public class ImageBuffer
extends Object
implements ImageData
    A utility for creating images from pixel operations Expected usage is: ImageBuffer buffer = new ImageBuffer(320,200); buffer.setRGBA(100,100,50,50,20,255); .. Image image = buffer.getImage();
    Author:
    kevin

      • setRGBA

        public void setRGBA(int x,
                    int y,
                    int r,
                    int g,
                    int b,
                    int a)
        Set a pixel in the image buffer
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the pixel to set
        y - The y position of the pixel to set
        r - The red component to set (0 to 255)
        g - The green component to set (0 to 255)
        b - The blue component to set (0 to 255)
        a - The alpha component to set (0 to 255)
